name: Pie Runners
description:
Overview

The year is 30xx and pie is illegal... Sort of. It's just really hard to find. A journey home from a shopping trip ends with delays and repairs (It was Asturd's fault), the purchase of a time dilation machine (it was Asturd's fault), and a treacherous path through an asteroid field (it was the asteroids' fault). Can you get home exactly on time? If not, well, something might happen? A game by Annie Sardelis, Brian Tam, Neale LaPlante Johnson, and Scott Todd. Made in Unity over a few days.

Controls

Spacebar - Shoot.

Z - Slow down time.

X - Return to normal.

C - Speed up time.

WASD - Movement.

Esc - Pause game.

Staff

Programming - Scott Todd

Art - Annie Sardelis, Brian Tam

Writing - Neale LaPlante Johnson, Annie Sardelis

Music - Neale LaPlante Johnson
